name: cloudflare-worker-monorepo
description: Modular Cloudflare Worker monorepo with frontend, backend, and shared agentic packages.

scripts.migrate: cd apps/worker && wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --remote
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run migrate && cd apps/worker && wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:dry-run: pnpm run build && cd apps/worker && wrangler deploy --dry-run
